name: Jinsei Game
overview: Japanese WiiWare version of "The Game of Life", the popular board game. (Google Translated from the official Japanese WiiWare page) Turn the roulette of destiny, you can enjoy the life of Hara Hara Kodoki! From the "comedian" and "soccer player" etc., start the game by choosing the job you want to become! The number of events occurring in "Joyous Mass", "Kanashimamasu", "Working Mass" is over 100! There are lots of fun unique to the WiiWare version, such as a circulation rule which can be played in a short time and a single reversal element by "super skeleton mass"!
